sentence.text: No formal drug/drug interaction studies with Plenaxis were performed.
sentence.negationtags: <scope> <cue> No </cue> formal drug/drug interaction studies with Plenaxis were performed. </scope>

sentence.text: Cytochrome P-450 is not known to be involved in the metabolism of Plenaxis.
sentence.negationtags: Cytochrome P-450 is <scope> <cue> not </cue> known to be involved in the metabolism of Plenaxis. </scope>

sentence.text: Plenaxis is highly bound to plasma proteins (96 to 99%).
Laboratory Tests Response to Plenaxis should be monitored by measuring serum total testosterone concentrations just prior to administration on Day 29 and every 8 weeks thereafter.
Serum transaminase levels should be obtained before starting treatment with Plenaxis and periodically during treatment.
Periodic measurement of serum PSA levels may also be considered.
